alert.note: Alert for Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 06 at 5:40AM MST until December 06 at 9:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than a quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Southwest Desert/Lower Gila River Valley County, especially along the Lordsburg Playa. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...At 5:30 AM Visibility was below 0.10 mile along I-10, east of the Arizona border.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Southwest Desert, Lower Gila River Valley
